meanings.sent1: The unlevelled ground made it hard to set up the tent.
meanings.sent2: The painter fixed the unlevelled surface before starting to paint.
meanings.sent3: The unlevelled floor caused the ball to bounce in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent4: Her unlevelled emotions made it difficult for her to focus.
meanings.sent5: The unlevelled road was a bumpy ride for the passengers.

meanings.sent1: The unlevelled shelf caused the books to slide off.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter had to fix the unlevelled table legs.
meanings.sent3: The unlevelled cake looked like a leaning tower of Pisa.
meanings.sent4: Her unlevelled haircut made her look like she had bedhead.
meanings.sent5: The unlevelled path twisted and turned through the forest.

meanings.sent1: The unlevelled chair wobbled when sat on.
meanings.sent2: The unlevelled stack of books threatened to topple over.
meanings.sent3: The unlevelled seesaw made it impossible for the kids to play on it.
meanings.sent4: His unlevelled mood swung from happy to sad in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The unlevelled boat rocked back and forth in the rough waters.
